feed.title: Osixia
feed.subtitle: What we do ? We dockerize, everything.

entry.title: 1 year later
entry.content:
It’s been a long time since the last blog post (almost 1 year!) but we are still alive and our images are updated regularly, no worries !

We are also updating all CHANGELOG.md files to follow Keep a Changelog best practices.

Get latest images updates and news on twitter : @osixia

Cheers.
entry.summary: It’s been a long time since the last blog post (almost 1 year!) but we are still alive and our images are updated regularly, no worries !

entry.title: Spring Flower Power Updates
entry.content:
It’s flower power time ! And the good time for a global package update on all our docker images. Re-pull images to get the updated version !

New docker images

Mailtrain

www-redirect

Ssl-helper

postfix-gateway

Deleted docker images

postfix-gateway-confd: is now postfix-gateway confd is not used anymore.

Gitlab: we now use the awesome sameersbn/gitlab image without extending it to add light-baseimage’s tools. The tools we need are now run by init containers on our kubernetes cluster.
entry.summary: It’s flower power time ! And the good time for a global package update on all our docker images.Re-pull images to get the updated version !

entry.title: Back To School
entry.content:
When kids go back to school we go on holidays :) But before that we just release new light-baseimage versions and some new docker images!

New light-baseimage images

Alpine is here! In beta for now an Alpine version of light-baseimage is now availaible. More info on Alpine-light-baseimage GitHub.

Alipne offer a much more light weight image and speed up deployment time:

  • osixia/alpine-light-baseimage: 44.88 MB
  • osixia/light-baseimage (debian jessie): 166.7 MB
  • osixia/ubuntu-light-baseimage: 217.1 MB

We also added some more options to all light-baseimage images please refer to the CHANGELOG.

All our docker images bases on light-baseimage have been updated.

New docker images

Piwik

Ipify-api

Freegeoip
entry.summary: When kids go back to school we go on holidays :) But before that we just release new light-baseimage versions and some new docker images!

entry.title: Summer Refreshing Updates
entry.content:
Hello, we just pushed updated versions of all our docker images, find details below:

Packages Updates

The following images don’t have any new release number but their packages have been updated.

  • light-baseimage:0.2.4
  • ubuntu-light-baseimage:0.1.6
  • experimental-light-baseimage:0.1.3
  • web-baseimage:0.1.10

Openldap

New version : 1.1.4 - Changelog.

Openldap Backup

New version : 0.1.9 - Changelog.

phpLDAPadmin

New version : 0.6.10 - Changelog.

MariaDB

New version : 0.2.10 - Changelog.

phpMyAdmin

New version : 0.3.6 - Changelog.

Roundcube

New version : 0.1.3 - Changelog.

GitLab

New version : 8.10.0 - Changelog.

Keepalived

New version : 0.2.2 - Changelog.

Keepalive CONFD config

New version : 0.1.2 - Changelog.

Backup Manager

New version : 0.1.6 - Changelog.

Docker registry LDAP auth proxy

New version : 0.1.1 - Changelog.

CFSSL Multirootca

New version : 0.1.1 - Changelog.

Tinc

New version : 0.1.2 - Changelog.

Tinc ETCD config

New version : 0.1.1 - Changelog.

MMC Web

New version : 1.0.2 - Changelog.

MMC Agent

New version : 1.0.2 - Changelog.

MMC Mail

New version : 0.1.8 - Changelog.

Baseimage

New version : 0.12.2 - Changelog.

entry.title: Hi! Welcome
entry.content: You are on our brand new blog :) We will post here docker images updates, development ideas or just anything we want to share with you. You can also follow us on Twitter.
